title: Personas & Storyboarding
description: How might we better emphasize with users at parking meters?

title: Redesigning the National Weather Services
description: Our interactions with government websites are often memorable for all the wrong reasons.

title: Iterative Design
description: This assignment is split into four parts to exemplify an iterative design process flow: (1) sketching ideas of the interface, (2) creating an interactive, high-fidelity prototype, (3) conducting user testing on a final, revised prototype, and (4) contacting the start up.

title: Deepfake Detection
description: This is your chance to develop an interactive interface, use interface components, and tie the components to an internal data state. Get even more comfortable with React by creating a list-based interface! Basically, an interface for users to select items out of a list, which then aggregates them.
